item.title: ZTALAB Best Practices
item.description: ZTALAB Practice This paper mainly records the rapid implementation and deployment of the main projects of ztalab, as well as the necessary configuration of each project, so as to realize the zero trust network security platform as soon as possible. Get Start Our zero-trust platform initialization relies on the basic components of Mysql, ZACA and ZAManager. The following is the deployment method we have prepared for you for your reference. You can customize and modify it and use it better.
